did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Article Files of the Bibliographical Society of the University of Virginia ca. 1964-1972

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Article Files of the Bibliographical Society of the University of Virginia, Accession #RG-24/2/2.761, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer from the Bibliographical Society of the University of Virginia, November 29, 1976.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Typescripts of articles submitted to the editors of Studies in Bibliography, the publication of the Bibliographical Society of the University of Virginia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The articles are arranged chronologically and subarranged alphabetically by the author's surname. They are preceded by the table of contents, if extant. Following the undated typescripts is a small group of minutes of the Bibliographical Society Council, miscellaneous notes on contributors, miscellaneous notes and typescripts, and three unpublished typescripts of articles.
